RodeoClientResponse_success.description: Boolean flag indicating overall attestation and/or appraisal success

RodeoClientResponse_error.description: String indicating errors that occured during attestation

RodeoClientResponse_cvm_request.description: Copland ProtocolRunRequest JSON structure selected by Rodeo tools, derived from 'RodeoClientRequest_attest_id' parameter of RodeoClientRequest

RodeoClientResponse_cvm_response.description: Copland ProtocolRunResponse JSON structure produced by a cvm interpreting the ProtocolRunRequest JSON structure ('RodeoClientResponse_cvm_request') of RodeoClientResponse
